verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> which came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to him <S%H6583>Pashhur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4441>Malchijah,<s%> and <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Please <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for <S%H1157>us;<s%> for <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> makes <S%H3898>war<s%> against <S%H3068>us:<s%> perhaps Yahweh will <S%H6213>deal<s%> with us according to all his wondrous <S%H6381>works,<s%> that he may go up from <S%H5927>us.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5437>Behold,<s%> I will turn back the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> that are in your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> with which you <S%H3898>fight<s%> against the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and against the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> who <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H2351>you,<s%> without the <S%H2346>walls;<s%> and I will <S%H622>gather<s%> them into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of this <S%H5892>city.<s%>

I myself will <S%H3898>fight<s%> against you with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> even in <S%H639>anger,<s%> and in <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>indignation.<s%>

I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of this <S%H5892>city,<s%> both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal:<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence.<s%>

<S%H310>Afterward,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even such as are <S%H7604>left<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%> from the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> from the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and from the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of those who <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life:<s%> and he shall <S%H5221>strike<s%> them with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> he shall not <S%H2347>spare<s%> <S%H2550>them,<s%> neither have pity, nor have <S%H7355>mercy.<s%>

To this <S%H5971>people<s%> you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I set <S%H6440>before<s%> you the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> and the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H4194>death.<s%>

He who <S%H3427>remains<s%> in this <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> but he who goes <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H5307>passes<s%> over to the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> who <S%H6696>besiege<s%> <S%H2421>you,<s%> he shall live, and his <S%H5315>life<s%> shall be to him for a <S%H7998>prey.<s%>

For I have <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> on this <S%H5892>city<s%> for <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and not for <S%H2896>good,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> it shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire.<s%>
Touching the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%>

<S%H1004>House<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H1777>Execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him who is <S%H1497>robbed<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6231>oppressor,<s%> lest my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> go <S%H3318>forth<s%> like <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H1197>burn<s%> so that none can <S%H3518>quench<s%> <S%H6440>it,<s%> because of the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

<S%H3427>Behold,<s%> I am against you, O inhabitant of the <S%H6010>valley,<s%> and of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> you that <S%H559>say,<s%> Who shall come <S%H5181>down<s%> against <S%H935>us?<s%> or who shall enter into our <S%H4585>habitations?<s%>

I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> you according to the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and I will <S%H3341>kindle<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> in her <S%H3293>forest,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> all that is around <S%H5439>her.<s%>
